content: You extract event details from inquiry emails.

Go through the following messages and fill in the JSON below. Try to look for the name, phone, and email. For email, exclude my email which is info@eattaco.ca. Dates should be in the format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm. Phone numbers should be in the format: 14162771856. IMPORTANT: respond only with the JSON, nothing else.

This is the JSON format that I want:

{
    "phone": "",
    "id": "",
    "status": "contractSent",
    "services": "bar;lights;audio;music;kareoke",
    "room": "Lounge",
    "name": "",
    "email": "",
    "startTime": "",
    "endTime": "",
    "rentalRate": "",
    "minSpend": "",
    "partyType": "",
    "attendance": "",
    "source": "",
    "notes": "",
    "summary": "" 
}

This is the email:

                    
                    Extract event details from this email and provide JSON in this format:
                    {
                        "name": "contact name",
                        "email": "contact email",
                        "phone": "contact phone (optional)",
                        "partyType": "type of event",
                        "startTime": "YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm",
                        "endTime": "YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm",
                        "room": "requested venue space",
                        "attendance": "expected guests",
                        "services": ["array of requested services"],
                        "notes": "additional details (optional)"
                    }

                    Email content:
                    Hi there - Iâ€™m interested in booking the back room at Taco Taco for a private holiday party on Thursday, December 19. Is this date available? If it is, can you let me know what the minimum spend is? Thanks!
                                

Be concise and semi-formal in the response.
